  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.BitcoinMath.btcToCoin(BigDecimal)
    Use Coin.ofBtc(BigDecimal)
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.BitcoinMath.btcToSatoshi(BigDecimal)
    Use Coin.btcToSatoshi(BigDecimal)
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.BitcoinMath.coinToBTC(Coin)
    Use Coin.toBtc()
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.BitcoinMath.satoshiToBtc(long)
    Use Coin.satoshiToBtc(long)
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ReceivedByAddressInfo.getAccount()
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinClient.sendRawTransaction(String, Boolean)
    In Bitcoin Core 0.19 and later, use BitcoinClient.sendRawTransaction(Transaction, Coin)
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinClient.sendRawTransaction(Transaction, Boolean)
    In Bitcoin Core 0.19 and later, use BitcoinClient.sendRawTransaction(Transaction, Coin)
    org.consensusj.bitcoin.services.WalletAppKitService.getinfo()
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AbstractRpcClient()
    Specify JSON-RPC version and use AbstractRpcClient(JsonRpcMessage.Version)
    org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcClientHttpUrlConnection(URI, String, String)
    Specify JSON-RPC version and use JsonRpcClientHttpUrlConnection(JsonRpcMessage.Version, URI, String, String)
    org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcRequest(String, List<Object>, String)
    Use JsonRpcRequest(JsonRpcMessage.Version, String, List)
